H0.text: what type of government does italy have 2011. Constitutional Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government does italy have 2011. Federal Republic

H2.text: what type of government does italy have 2011. Presidential Republic

H3.text: what type of government does italy have 2011. Parliamentary republic

A4.text: Italy has been a unitary parliamentary republic since 1946, when the monarchy was abolished.

A5.text: The prime minister and cabinet are appointed by the president, and confirmed by a vote of confidence in parliament.
